long_description: Great for campsite relaxation, tailgating or backyard BBQs, the YETI Beverage Holder latches on to your YETI cooler, providing a convenient way to keep your drink close. Beverage holder is built from sturdy powder-coated steel and slides securely into the tie-down slot of YETI coolers (sold separately). Beverage holder doesn't interfere with opening or closing the cooler lid, making it easy to access contents.
short_description: Great for campsite relaxation, tailgating or backyard BBQs, the YETI Beverage Holder latches on to your YETI cooler, providing a convenient way to keep your drink close.
